definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

pinyin: Ke1 luo2 la1 duo1 da4 xia2 gu3

sentences.english: Two girlfriends and I piled into a car and headed to Aspen, Colo.
sentences.chinese: 我和两个女友挤进一辆车，驰向科罗拉多的阿斯彭。

sentences.english: Colorado Children's Chorale is one of the three best children's chorales.
sentences.chinese: 科罗拉多童声合唱团是世界最著名的三大合唱团之一。

sentences.english: Buffalos used to roam freely on the Colorado Plains.
sentences.chinese: 水牛以前常常自由自在地在科罗拉多平原上漫步。

sentences.english: Two more shots that show Colorado's Rocky Mountains inside the canyon.
sentences.chinese: 这是科罗拉多落基山脉峡谷里的两张照片。

sentences.english: They were naked, " says Noel Lenski, a historian at the University of Colorado at Boulder.
sentences.chinese: 他来自波尔德的科罗拉多大学。

sentences.english: Pack your skis and your hiking boots and follow us.
sentences.chinese: 拿好你的滑雪板和登山靴到科罗拉多来吧。

sentences.english: Walking distance to Colorado Blvd where there are lots of shops &restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 可步行到科罗拉多大道，那里有很多商店和餐馆。

sentences.english: On September 9th he drove from Colorado to New York City.
sentences.chinese: 九月九日，扎齐从科罗拉多驱车返回纽约。

sentences.english: The study took place in Pueblo, Colorado.
sentences.chinese: 这个研究选在科罗拉多的普韦布洛进行。

sentences.english: The Grand Canyon is one of the wonders of the world.
sentences.chinese: 科罗拉多大峡谷是世界奇观之一。

sentences.english: Colorado also ranks 12th in particle pollution.
sentences.chinese: 科罗拉多可吸入颗粒污染排名第十二。

sentences.english: I live in Colorado which can be hot and dry, with lots of wind and sun in the summertime.
sentences.chinese: 我住在又干又热的科罗拉多，夏天太阳很毒，风很大。

sentences.english: But getting marijuana off Coloradans' minds might be tougher.
sentences.chinese: 但是让大麻远离科罗拉多人的脑海是个更艰巨的任务。

sentences.english: Don't get snowed-in in Colorado. Steven will be very upset.
sentences.chinese: 别被雪阻在科罗拉多，史蒂文会很苦恼的。

sentences.english: Colorado Children's Chorale is one of the three world-famous children's chorales, together with Vienna …
sentences.chinese: 科罗拉多童声合唱团是世界最著名的三大合唱团之一。

sentences.english: A proud Colorado farmer has bred a rare cross-breed miniature cow.
sentences.chinese: 一位得意的科罗拉多农夫喂养了一种杂交的小牛。
